name: triangle-geohash
description: triangle-geohash is pretty much geohash but with triangles. The earth is split into an icosahedron, and each one of those triangles is split into 4 sub triangles. Hashes are formatted in the following way: [primary triangle number]|[sub triangle numbers], so for example, the triangle geohash for the bermuda triangle, coordinates (27,-71), with depth 12, would be '15|222223334412', creepy huh?

scripts.version: npm run lint && git add -A src

author: shmibblez
